resources.string: No internet connection. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Network Error. An error occurred while communicating with the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Network Error: The connection timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Service Unavailable: The server is currently unable to handle the request. Please try again later.
Internal Server Error: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
Not Found: The requested resource could not be found on the server.
Invalid Request: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax or missing parameters.
Unauthorized: Access to the requested resource requires authentication or authorization.
